page.title: 18FARMS AND CROPS BRIDGE AREA
page.content: Our Domesday Block consists of farmland which surrounds the three villages of Bridge,Patrixbourne,and Bekesbourne.There are seven farms in our area but their land is not all in our area.The farms are arable farms or mixed farms.Crops we have seen growing this year are{apples,pears}and{ {plums;wheat,oats,barley;strawberries, {raspberries,}and{gooseberries;hops;oil {seed rape;potatoes,cabbages onions}and {peas.}We have seen several fields used for hay and silage.Animals we have seen include dairy cows,beef cows and sheep. We found out that,in our school {20}fathers and{16}mothers work on a farm.{15}children live on a farm.{3} mothers and fathers own a farm.
